      • isDetectFieldErrors

        public boolean isDetectFieldErrors()

      • setDetectFieldErrors

        public void setDetectFieldErrors(boolean detectFieldErrors)
        When rendering, should field errors be detected from the bound object. If true (default) the controlName of the form control will be used as property name of the bound object, if no such property, an exception will occur when rendering.
        Parameters:
        detectFieldErrors - true if field errors should be detected
